metadata.title: CVE-2024-56746 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fbdev: sh7760fb: Fix a possible memory leak in sh7760fb_alloc_mem()When information such as info->screen_base is not ready, callingsh7760fb_free_mem() does not release memory correctly. Calldma_free_coherent() instead.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
